title: Permaculture garden startup in the Morvan France. Inspiring couple with love for the earth.

tasks.task: Operating farming equipment and preparing the garden.
subtasks: Digging trenches for the polytunnel.
Installing plastic foil on the metal frame of the polytunnel.
Ensuring the polytunnel is stable and secure.
Creating and tending gardens.
Coordinating with others (e.g., Sina, Hilda, Oscar) in managing the garden.
Using a multifunctional tool (double as a back scratcher).
Operating a sewing machine.
Constructing a polytunnel frame.
Planting nitrogen-fixing plants to enrich the soil.
Sharing videos and encouraging support (like, donate, share).
Engaging with an audience (responding to comments, interactions).
Living in a castle setting (Fougeret).
Transitioning from travel to settled farming.
Fostering community and skill-sharing among group members.
